preqs: Students must be granted permission by the unit coordinator before undertaking this unit.

rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {03, 04, 05, 06, 07, 11, 12, 42}

time: Summer semester A (starts November) 2017 (On-campus block of classes)

description: This unit centres on both a conceptual and practical approach to International Accounting Issues with emphasis on international standard setting and compliance as viewed by regulators and private sector preparers of accounts. Students gain a practical understanding of these issues in an international context through the overseas visitation program which forms an integral part of this unit.
